mapper.select:
SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , E.CLNTNM , A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,1,3) ||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,4,3) ||'-'|| SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,7,4) ||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,11,4) ||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,15,1) SRA_INDV_AMNNO_FORMAT3 , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,7,4) ||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,11,4) ||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,15,1) SRA_INDV_AMNNO_FORMAT2 , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,4,3) ||'-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,7,4) ||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,11,4) ||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ,15,1) SRA_INDV_AMNNO_FORMAT , A.AUC_DT , SUBSTR(A.AUC_DT, 0,4) || '년 ' || SUBSTR(A.AUC_DT, 5,2) || '월 ' || SUBSTR(A.AUC_DT, 7,2) || '일' AS AUC_DT_STR , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , I.SIMP_CNM AS AUC_OBJ_DSC_NM , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , D.FTSNM , B.INDV_SEX_C , H.SIMP_CNM AS INDV_SEX_C_NM , NVL(A.COW_SOG_WT,0) COW_SOG_WT , NVL(A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM,0) LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , NVL(A.SRA_SBID_AM,0) SRA_SBID_AM , TO_CHAR(NVL(A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM,0),'FM999,999,999') LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM_FORMAT , TO_CHAR(NVL(A.SRA_SBID_AM,0),'FM999,999,999') SRA_SBID_AM_FORMAT , NVL(MIN(DECODE(A.SEL_STS_DSC, '22', A.SRA_SBID_AM)) OVER(PARTITION BY A.NA_BZPLC, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC, A.AUC_DT),0) AS MIN_SRA_SBID_AM , NVL(MAX(DECODE(A.SEL_STS_DSC, '22', A.SRA_SBID_AM)) OVER(PARTITION BY A.NA_BZPLC, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC, A.AUC_DT),0) AS MAX_SRA_SBID_AM , NVL(DECODE(#{obj_gbn},'2',D.CUS_MPNO,C.CUS_MPNO),'') AS CUS_MPNO , NVL(TRIM(DECODE(#{obj_gbn},'2',D.FTSNM,C.SRA_MWMNNM)),'') AS REVE_USR_NM , NVL(F.TMS_YN, 'N') AS TMS_YN , NVL(F.SMS_FWDG_DT, '') AS SMS_FWDG_DT , C.SRA_MWMNNM , G.TELNO CLNT_TELNO , A.AUC_DT || LPAD(A.OSLP_NO, 4, '0') || NVL(#{sms_key},0) SMS_SEND_KEY , G.BRC AS ADJ_BRC FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC ) LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = C.TRMN_AMNNO ) LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS D ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = D.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = D.FARM_AMNNO ) INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC E ON A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_WMC G ON A.NA_BZPLC = G.NA_BZPLC LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_SMS F ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = F.NA_BZPLC AND F.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND F.TRMN_AMNNO = A.AUC_DT || LPAD(A.OSLP_NO, 4, '0') || NVL(#{sms_key},0) AND F.DPAMN_DSC = #{obj_gbn} AND F.SEL_STS_DSC = #{msg_gbn} AND TMS_TYPE = '02' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SIMP_C, SIMP_CNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL WHERE SIMP_TPC = 'INDV_SEX_C' AND SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) H ON ( H.SIMP_C = B.INDV_SEX_C ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SIMP_C, SIMP_CNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL WHERE SIMP_TPC = 'AUC_OBJ_DSC' AND SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '7' ) I ON ( I.SIMP_C = A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = DECODE(#{auc_obj_dsc},'0',A.AUC_OBJ_DSC,#{auc_obj_dsc}) AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt}
AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'
AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0
AND LENGTH(NVL(DECODE(#{obj_gbn},'2',D.CUS_MPNO,C.CUS_MPNO),'')) >= 10 AND LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE(NVL(DECODE(#{obj_gbn},'2',D.CUS_MPNO,C.CUS_MPNO),''), '[^0-9]')) >= 10 ORDER BY A.AUC_PRG_SQ, D.FTSNM

SELECT C.NA_BZPLC , E.CLNTNM , G.TELNO CLNT_TELNO , #{auc_dt} AUC_DT , SUBSTR(#{auc_dt}, 0,4) || '년 ' || SUBSTR(#{auc_dt}, 5,2) || '월 ' || SUBSTR(#{auc_dt}, 7,2) || '일' AS AUC_DT_STR , C.SRA_MWMNNM REVE_USR_NM , NVL(F.TMS_YN, 'N') AS TMS_YN , NVL(F.SMS_FWDG_DT, '') AS SMS_FWDG_DT , NVL(C.CUS_MPNO,'') CUS_MPNO , #{auc_dt} || LPAD(C.TRMN_AMNNO, 4, '0') || NVL(#{sms_key},0) SMS_SEND_KEY , G.BRC AS ADJ_BRC FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN C INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN D ON ( C.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND D.AUC_DT =#{auc_dt} AND DECODE(D.AUC_OBJ_DSC,'0',#{auc_obj_dsc},D.AUC_OBJ_DSC) = #{auc_obj_dsc} ) INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC E ON C.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_WMC G ON C.NA_BZPLC = G.NA_BZPLC LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_SMS F ON ( C.NA_BZPLC = F.NA_BZPLC AND F.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND F.TRMN_AMNNO = #{auc_dt} || LPAD(C.TRMN_AMNNO, 4, '0') || NVL(#{sms_key},0) AND F.DPAMN_DSC = '1' AND F.SEL_STS_DSC = '01' AND F.TMS_TYPE = '02' ) WHERE C.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND C.DEL_YN = '0' AND LENGTH(REPLACE(NVL(C.CUS_MPNO,''), '-', '')) >= 10 AND LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE(NVL(C.CUS_MPNO,''), '[^0-9]')) >= 10

SELECT T.* , E.CLNTNM , NVL(F.TMS_YN, 'N') AS TMS_YN , NVL(F.SMS_FWDG_DT, '') AS SMS_FWDG_DT , G.TELNO CLNT_TELNO , G.BRC AS ADJ_BRC , C.SIMP_CNM AS BANK_NM , G.ACNO , T.AUC_DT , SUBSTR(T.AUC_DT, 0,4) || '년 ' || SUBSTR(T.AUC_DT, 5,2) || '월 ' || SUBSTR(T.AUC_DT, 7,2) || '일' AS AUC_DT_STR , NVL(D.CUS_MPNO,'') AS CUS_MPNO , NVL(TRIM(D.SRA_MWMNNM),'') AS REVE_USR_NM , T.TOT_SRA_SBID_AM + T.TOT_SRA_TR_FEE AS TOT_AM , T.AUC_DT || LPAD(T.TRMN_AMNNO, 4, '0') || NVL(#{sms_key},0) SMS_SEND_KEY FROM ( SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , ${auc_obj_dsc} AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_DT , A.TRMN_AMNNO , COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT , SUM(NVL(A.SRA_SBID_AM,0)) AS TOT_SRA_SBID_AM , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE,0)) AS TOT_SRA_TR_FEE FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B ON A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(NVL(SRA_TR_FEE, 0)* DECODE(ANS_DSC, 1, 1, -1) ) AS SRA_TR_FEE , NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , FEE_APL_OBJ_C FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = DECODE(#{auc_obj_dsc},'0',AUC_OBJ_DSC,#{auc_obj_dsc}) GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC, AUC_DT, OSLP_NO, LED_SQNO, FEE_APL_OBJ_C ) C ON A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = C.LED_SQNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = DECODE(#{auc_obj_dsc},'0',A.AUC_OBJ_DSC,#{auc_obj_dsc}) AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'
GROUP BY A.NA_BZPLC, A.AUC_DT, A.TRMN_AMNNO
, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC
) T LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN D ON T.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND T.TRMN_AMNNO = D.TRMN_AMNNO INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC E ON T.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_WMC G ON T.NA_BZPLC = G.NA_BZPLC LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_SMS F ON T.NA_BZPLC = F.NA_BZPLC AND T.AUC_OBJ_DSC = F.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND F.TRMN_AMNNO = T.AUC_DT || LPAD(T.TRMN_AMNNO, 4, '0') || NVL(#{sms_key},0) AND F.DPAMN_DSC = '1' AND TMS_TYPE = '02' LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL C ON C.SIMP_C = G.REP_BNK_C AND C.SIMP_TPC = 'BNK_C' AND C.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' WHERE LENGTH(REPLACE(NVL(D.CUS_MPNO,''), '-', '')) >= 10 AND LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE(NVL(D.CUS_MPNO,''), '[^0-9]')) >= 10
